inlineImageAndParagraph.text: Decentro's Farsight Phonetic Name Matching API utilizes advanced algorithms to understand sound-alike variations in names. It accurately verifies identities by overcoming spelling discrepancies, transliteration issues, and cultural nuances like Indian honorifics.

items.description: Automatically remove titles, honorifics (e.g., 'Shri', 'Ji'), and special characters to isolate the core name.
Apply advanced algorithms to detect sound-alike patterns and handle transliteration variations effectively.
Generate a precise similarity score based on configurable thresholds to determine a confident match.
